content.rendered: Maple Ave. Picture Days will be held on October 23rd, 24th, and 25th during Gym classes.  Picture make-ups will be held on October 26th and 27th during Flex periods.

excerpt.rendered: Maple Ave. Picture Days will be held on October 23rd, 24th, and 25th during Gym classes.  Picture make-ups will be held on October 26th and 27th during Flex periods.
